sourcesContent:
import { Switch, Route } from 'react-router-dom'
import useDataResource from './hooks/useDataResource'

import Nav from './components/Nav'
import SearchBar from './components/SearchBar'
import SectionHome from './components/SectionHome'
import SectionSong from './components/SectionSong'
import SectionAlbum from './components/SectionAlbum'
import SectionArtist from './components/SectionArtist'
import NotFound from './components/NotFound'

import GlobalStyles from './GlobalStyles'
import { AppContainer } from './App.style'
import './App.css'

import { Suspense } from 'react'
import Loader from './components/Loader'

const App = () => {
  const [data, randomSongs, handleDataChange] = useDataResource()

  return (
    <AppContainer>
      <GlobalStyles />
      <Nav />
      <SearchBar setData={handleDataChange} />
      <Switch>
        <Route path='/artist'>
          {data && data._type === 'error' 
            ? <NotFound />
            : <SectionArtist details={data} handleSelect={handleDataChange} />
          }
        </Route>
        <Route path='/song'>
          {data && data._type === 'error' 
            ? <NotFound />
            : <SectionSong details={data} handleSelect={handleDataChange} />
          }
        </Route>
        <Route path='/album'>
          {/* {data && data._type === 'error' 
            ? <NotFound />
            : <SectionAlbum details={data} handleSelect={handleDataChange} />
          } */}

          <Suspense fallback={<Loader />}>
            <SectionAlbum details={data} handleSelect={handleDataChange} />
          </Suspense>
        </Route>
        <Route path='/'>
          <SectionHome randomSongs={randomSongs} handleSelect={handleDataChange} />
        </Route>
      </Switch>
    </AppContainer>
  )
}

export default App;
